projectsList.name: ProgriScript
projectsList.description: A progressive web app that compiles, runs, and teaches the user about the ProgriScript language.
details: Collaborated with Raul Hernandez to develop the compiler and virtual machine in JavaScript, using Jison.
Designed and developed the user-interface in Ionic.

projectsList.name: GeminAI
projectsList.description: A hybrid chatbot based on AIML and a Seq2Seq model.
details: Designed and developed the back-end using Python in Google Cloud Run.
Integrated GeminAI with tools from DuckDuckGo, DialogFlow, TensorFlow, AIML, and others.
This application was developed for the MSc Dissertation, along with a thesis.

projectsList.name: Vibe
projectsList.description: An application that allows users to detect their current emotion by analyzing their face.
details: Designed the front-end of the application in Ionic and Angular.
Collaborated with colleagues to integrate it with a back-end model hosted in Google Cloud Run.
This application was developed for Centro Puzzle, a rehabilitation center in Italy.

projectsList.name: prodActiv
projectsList.description: An iOS graphical task manager in Swift 4.
details: Collaborated with colleagues to develop the application for an iOS class.
Built using card-based graphical interface, along with extensive use of RegEx and notifications.

projectsList.name: POIAPP & POI-API
projectsList.description: A crowd-sourced Points of Interest back-end and Progressive Web App.
details: Collaborated with Ariel Mendez to develop the front-end in Ionic and back-end in MongoDB.
Designed and developed the user-interface and database.

education.title: Education
education.masters: MSc Artificial Intelligence at University of Essex
education.college: B.S. Computer Science and Technology (BCT) at ITESM-Campus Monterrey

programmingLanguages.title: Programming Languages
list: Experience with Java, C++, Swift, C#

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.list: HTML, CSS, JQuery, Express, SQL, MongoDB (NoSQL), Git, Google Cloud, Heroku, Android SDK, iOS SDK, Ionic, Angular, React, Puppeteer, Unix/Bash, TensorFlow, Preact, Unity, Cypress

info.title: Our services
info.description: Nuxio Solutions helps companies succeed in the digital age. We provide innovative solutions that transform your business, so you can stay ahead and increase your profits.

projectsList.name: ProgriScript
projectsList.description: Una aplicación web progresiva que compila, ejecuta y enseña al usuario sobre el lenguaje ProgriScript.
details: Colaboré con Raúl Hernández para desarrollar el compilador y la máquina virtual en JavaScript, usando Jison.
Diseñé y desarrollé la interfaz de usuario en Ionic.

projectsList.name: GeminAI
projectsList.description: Un chatbot híbrido basado en AIML y un modelo Seq2Seq.
details: Diseñé y desarrollé el Back-End usando Python en Google Cloud Run.
Integré GeminAI con herramientas de DuckDuckGo, DialogFlow, TensorFlow, AIML y otros.
Esta aplicación fue desarrollada para la disertación de maestría, junto con una tesis.

projectsList.name: Vibe
projectsList.description: Una aplicación que permite a los usuarios detectar su emoción actual mediante el análisis de su rostro.
details: Diseñé el Front-End de la aplicación en Ionic y Angular.
Colaboré con colegas para integrarlo con un modelo de Back-End alojado en Google Cloud Run.
Esta aplicación fue desarrollada para Centro Puzzle, un centro de rehabilitación en Italia.

projectsList.name: prodActiv
projectsList.description: Un administrador de tareas gráfico de iOS en Swift 4.
details: Colaboré con colegas para desarrollar la aplicación para una clase de iOS.
Creado con una interfaz gráfica basada en tarjetas, junto con un uso extensivo de RegEx y notificaciones.

projectsList.name: POIAPP & POI-API
projectsList.description: Una aplicación web progresiva y back-end de puntos de interés de fuentes múltiples.
details: Colaboré con Ariel Méndez para desarrollar el Front-End en Ionic y el Back-End en MongoDB.
Diseñé y desarrollé la interfaz de usuario y la base de datos.
